column4: is it save to remove gnome-dekstop after installing lubuntu-dekstop in lucid ?
you can remove ubuntu-desktop at anytime, its a hollow metapackage

then you should be ok, you may find some of the apps you use rely on gnome-desktop-data. Try starting the uninstall then read what else it will remove
